FuncDef:
The ip-address command configures an IP address for an entity.
The undo ip-address command deletes the configuration. The ip-address command configures an IP address for an entity. The undo ip-address command deletes the configuration. By default, a PKI entity does not have an IP address.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of a PKI entity.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the IPv6 address of a PKI entity.
The value is in colon hexadecimal notation.

Specifies an interface IP address of a PKI entity as an IPv6 address.
By default, an interface IP address of a PKI entity is an IPv4 address.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
